
{{alias}}( e )
    Returns a JSON representation of an error object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    e: Error|TypeError|SyntaxError|URIError|ReferenceError|RangeError|EvalError
        Error to serialize.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Object
        JSON representation.

    Examples
    --------
    > var err = new Error( 'beep' );
    > var json = {{alias}}( err );
    <Object>

    See Also
    --------
